lead_paragraph: Siemens raised its full-year outlook for earnings per share after beating market expectations for first-quarter industrial profit, revenue and orders.
snippet: Siemens raised its full-year outlook for earnings per share after beating market expectations for first-quarter industrial profit, revenue and orders.

headline.main: Siemens Beats Expectations and Raises Earnings Outlook
headline.print_headline: Siemens Beats Expectations and Raises Earnings Outlook

abstract: Siemens raises full-year earnings outlook, saying it expects per share earnings of 6 euros to 6.40 euros, or $6.50 to $6.93, up from projection of 5.90 euros to 6.20 euros made in September.
